author: Matthew J. Belvedere
title: What to watch today: Dow to bounce after two-session drop of over 1,200 points
description: U.S. stock futures bounce Wednesday after concerns about the unprecedented oil collapse wiped more than 1,200 points off the Dow this week.
content:
BY THE NUMBERS
U.S. stock futures were pointing to a rebound for the Dow at this morning's open. Concerns about the unprecedented plunge in oil prices slammed the Dow again Tuesday, wiping out more than 1,200 points this week. Blue chips dropped 2.4% on Mond… [+6500 chars]
